meanings.definition: A person who maintains a golf course, specifically the putting greens.
meanings.sent1: The greenskeepers mow the grass on the golf course every morning.
meanings.sent2: The greenskeepers work hard to keep the putting greens in top condition for the golfers.
meanings.sent3: The greenskeepers joked that they could play a round of golf blindfolded after all their practice.
meanings.sent4: The greenskeepers are the unsung heroes of the golf course, ensuring every blade of grass is perfect.
meanings.sent5: The greenskeepers take pride in their work, creating a lush green paradise for golfers to enjoy.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals responsible for caring for the grass and landscaping on a golf course.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the greenskeepers gather to discuss the day's tasks for maintaining the golf course.
meanings.sent2: The greenskeepers coordinate their efforts to ensure the entire golf course looks pristine.
meanings.sent3: The greenskeepers organized a friendly competition to see who could trim the grass into the most creative shape.
meanings.sent4: To the golfers, the greenskeepers are like magicians, transforming the course into a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The greenskeepers work together like a well-oiled machine, each playing a crucial role in maintaining the golf course.
